issue.title: Unable to preview a metadata as editor or responsible if not in access scope
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Unable to preview a metadata as editor or responsible if not in access scope.

With delegation, we can manage and edit objects of other organisms.

The problem is specific:
if the user "userA" of organism "orgA" has the rights to edit a resource in organism "orgB": he can edit metadata, diffusion etc...
if the resource has an access scope to "only organism orgB" he will not be able to preview the metadata.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1
